title: Best Buddies
description: You can’t be gay if you’re watching straight porn together, right? And if someone’s hand ends up on someone else’s cock, that’s just the heat of the moment. Doesn’t mean anything. And it wasn’t like they set out to kill anyone either. These things just happen. Aiden and Sonny are just regular guys, best buddies, doing what they can to get by.
author: Cain Berlinger
